hymn.title: I come to His presence afresh

layout.singingstanza: I come to His pre -- sence a -- fresh Ere the night has passed in -- to morn -- ing; And His face I see as it shines on me— The Lord with -- in is dawn -- ing. And He speaks to me and re -- veals to me All His rich -- es for me to -- day; And with sweet de -- light I par -- take of Him, My hun -- ger has passed a -- way.

lyrics.stanza: As Spirit He speaks thru the Word Till my heart in echo is singing, And the fount of life with His grace and pow'r Within my soul is springing. And He speaks to me and reveals to me All His riches for me today; And I drink of Him for my every need, My thirsting has passed away.

In tenderness He deals with me, While I stay with joy in His presence; And He saturates and supplies my soul With all His precious essence. And He speaks to me and reveals to me All His riches for me today; And in every way I partake of Him, My problems all passed away.
